page.title: 16MY FAMILY'S USUAL WEEKEND
page.content: After getting home from school on Friday I watch T.V. and at 5 o'clock mum calls my two younger brothers and I for tea. Afterwards I take my pony for a trek in Blakeney Hill woods. My mum takes the car to shop in Lydney and arrives home at 8 p.m. After tea and biscuits for supper I go to bed. Saturday morning sees all the family going down the hill to the butcher's in Blakeney. We usually buy "something with chips" for our lunch at home. In the afternoon, I go riding again while mum and dad work on the garden and house. For tea we usually have sandwiches, then watch T.V. before bed. Two of us go to Sunday School in the morning. We all enjoy our Sunday Roast and the afternoon follows the Saturday pattern. In the evening we all have to wash our hair before bed !
